tool_description: All National News from the  "The Hindu" newspaper.
name: The Hindu National news
title: The Hindu National news

api_list.name: to get The Hindu National News by pageNo
api_list.description: it gives National News from the given Page no
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-hindu-national-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/23"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-hindu-national-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-hindu-national-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{pageid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-hindu-national-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get the Hindu National News
api_list.description: the endpoint will return national news from "The Hindu" newspaper
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://the-hindu-national-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{pageid}"
